keyPolicies.policyDescription: Iain's priority is a strong local economy providing well-paid jobs and world-class public services, especially our local NHS.
Iain will be an accessible and accountable local MP who listens and speaks up for our community; our voice in Parliament.
Iain wants real investment for our area, with an end to Labour's traffic chaos and protection for our precious green spaces.

issues.economy: Iain's priority is a strong local economy providing well-paid jobs and world-class public services, especially our local NHS.
issues.environment: Protection for our precious green spaces.
issues.health: World-class public services, especially our local NHS.

images.caption: Iain Lindley with a caption 'A strong local voice for Worsley and Eccles South.'
